title: Wont let me play, or even do the Tutorial/Training, and i dont get a error msg
body:
well as the title says, I cant play at all, everything is working except getting into a game be it PVP, or just the PVE training
and with no error msg I cant diagnose it, I did however get the PVP kernel error msg, then I ran as admin, and it never showed up.
could they be linked? any advice or tips would be nice, I'm pretty new to the game, and I'm trying to get into it again

replies.body: The kernel error could be linked, but I need more information to know.  Specifically, what do see exactly when you're supposed to be getting a game.  Doesn't anything appear at all?  Let me know!
